select t.order_no, t.time_phase, t.visit_date, t.title, r.close_type, r.close_time, t.site_title, t.venue_type, r.cover_url, r.verify_no, r.pay_type, r.price, r.discount_amount, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.refund_amount, r.complete_time, r.nick_name, r.cd_key, r.cd_key_amount, r.mobile, r.state, r.refund_state, r.remark from `order` r inner join venue_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
and r.merchant_id = #{merchantId}

select t.order_no, t.time_phase, t.visit_date, t.title, t.site_title, t.venue_type, t.telephone, t.open_time, t.city_id, t.county_id, t.detail_address, t.longitude, t.latitude, r.cover_url, r.verify_no, r.pay_type, r.price, r.cd_key, r.cd_key_amount, r.discount_amount, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.complete_time, r.nick_name, r.mobile, r.state, r.refund_state, r.remark from `order` r inner join venue_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo}

select t.title as productTitle, t.cover_url as productCover, t.store_id, r.venue_site_id as productId from venue_order r inner join `order` t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.id = #{orderId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo} and t.deleted = false
